item.title: -help- With sicknasty vengence
item.dc:creator: @abbysal abbysal
item.description:
@abbysal wrote:

[quote=“puresdeath, post:1, topic:194589”]how can i make it where i can do the vengence more then once instead of waiting acouple of minutes here is the part i think is where u change it

case 51039:
if(Vengeance >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You must wait one minute before activating vengeance again.”);
}
if(Vengeance <= 0 && hitTimer <= 0 && playerLevel[6] >= 96 && PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) {
Vengeance = 120;
hitTimer = 10;
hitCount = 0;
stillgfx(422, absY, absX);
startAnimation(1979);
txt4 = “Taste Vengeance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“You activate Vengeance!.”);
}
if(playerLevel[6] <= 95) {
sendMessage(“You need to be at least 96 magic to activate Vengeance.”);
}
if(!(PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null)) {
sendMessage(“You must be in combat to activate Vengeance.”);
}
break;[/quote]
where it says hittimer 10 change lower like to 5 or something

Read full topic

item.title: -help- With sicknasty vengence
item.dc:creator: @puresdeath puresdeath
item.description:
@puresdeath wrote:

how can i make it where i can do the vengence more then once instead of waiting acouple of minutes here is the part i think is where u change it

case 51039:
if(Vengeance >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You must wait one minute before activating vengeance again.”);
}
if(Vengeance <= 0 && hitTimer <= 0 && playerLevel[6] >= 96 && PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) {
Vengeance = 120;
hitTimer = 10;
hitCount = 0;
stillgfx(422, absY, absX);
startAnimation(1979);
txt4 = “Taste Vengeance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“You activate Vengeance!.”);
}
if(playerLevel[6] <= 95) {
sendMessage(“You need to be at least 96 magic to activate Vengeance.”);
}
if(!(PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null)) {
sendMessage(“You must be in combat to activate Vengeance.”);
}
break;

Read full topic
